content.raw: Umm interesting. Note that your change is in the `ignition_debbuild` variable to it is designed to produce versioned debbuild jobs. We don't have versioned jobs for Windows and Brew, only support for `default`.  Your changes looks good to me assuming the previous statement. I will add support for versioned Brew and Mac in a new PR.
content.html: Umm interesting. Note that your change is in the ignition_debbuild variable to it is designed to produce versioned debbuild jobs. We don't have versioned jobs for Windows and Brew, only support for default. Your changes looks good to me assuming the previous statement. I will add support for versioned Brew and Mac in a new PR.
